full_summary:
================ 

## Strategic Tanker Transport Capability (STTC) Project - Invitation to Qualify for Long-Term In-Service Support

**Notice Reference:** cb-348-95809403
**Solicitation Number:** W847A-200275/L
**Publication Date:** 2024-01-18
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-03-26T14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** 2024-03-26

### Notice Description
Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, invites respondents to participate in an Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) for the long-term In-Service Support (ISS) of the CC330 fleet. The CC330 Husky is a Canadian variant of the Airbus A330-MRTT multi-role tanker aircraft, providing air-to-air refueling capabilities to the Royal Canadian Air Force.

The CC330 fleet will comprise eight MRTT aircraft and one government of Canada transport aircraft. This ITQ is the first phase of a procurement process for the long-term maintenance support and materiel support of the CC330.

**Selection Criteria:**
* Qualification will be based on a weighted evaluation of responder capabilities, technical merit, and price.
* Responders must meet the minimum requirements outlined in the ITQ documentation.

**Tender Inquiry**
All inquiries and other communications related to this notice must be submitted in writing to the attention of the PSPC Contracting Authority at [TPSGC.PAASTR-APSTTC.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:TPSGC.PAASTR-APSTTC.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

**Documents**
The following documents are available for review and download:

* Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) - Long-Term In-Service Support
* Amendment 001 to the ITQ
* Amendment 002 to the ITQ
* Amendment 003 to the ITQ
* Amendment 004 to the ITQ
* Amendment 005 to the ITQ
* Amendment 006 to the ITQ
* Documents 1 to 4

(Note: These documents are subject to change without notice. Respondents must review the latest version of the ITQ and amendments prior to submitting a response.)

**Respondent Information**
Respondents must submit their response electronically through the "Supplier Registration" portal on Buyandsell.gc.ca. Responses received after the tender closing date and time will not be considered.
